forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible this morning with partly cloudy skies for the afternoon. High 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 48F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 2C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 37F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 0C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 37F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.
